title: The captive-captain, or, The restrain'd cavalier drawn to his full bodie in these characters ... presented and acted to life in a suit of durance, an habit suiting best with his place of residence.
author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.
notes: Attributed to Brathwait by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: faded and tightly bound with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
